The decision came down to how best optimise Google's triumvirate of power( Eric Schmidt , Page and Sergey Brin ) to become a more adaptable enterprise. Larry, Sergey Brin and I have been talking for a long time about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making- and over the holidays we decided now was the right moment to make some changes to the way we are structured, Eric Schmidt said.
